creator: dominique.devriese@gmail.com
text:
Please look at the following bug first (about BundleTag):
  https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=18525

Exactly the same problem is present in the LocaleTag. It should not set the locale variable when this variable is not passed as an attribute. Workaround: pass locale="<%= null %>".

Please fix, thanks in advance,

Dominique

creator: bayard@apache.org
text: JSTL replaced the i18n taglib, so this won't be worked on.
